GSD.description:
fs: dlm: fix race in lowcomms

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit de7fdff754bb4d01e38e19964c309b6df6a79472. For more details please see the references link.
